metadata.title: CVE-2020-13350 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: CSRF in runner administration page in all versions of GitLab CE/EE allowsan attacker who's able to target GitLab instance administrators topause/resume runners. Affected versions are >=13.5.0, <13.5.2,>=13.4.0,<13.4.5,<13.3.9.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
